text: Eyin ti e gbagbo ni ododo, enikeni ti o ba peyinda nibi esin re ninu yin, laipe Allahu maa mu awon eniyan kan wa; O maa nifee won, awon naa maa nifee Re. Won yoo ro fun awon onigbagbo ododo. Won yo si le mo awon alaigbagbo. Won yoo maa jagun esin fun Allahu. Won ko si nii beru eebu eleeebu. Iyen ni oore ajulo Allahu. O n fun eni ti O ba fe. Allahu si ni Olugbooro, Onimo
